title: Part-time Medical Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Job Title: Medical Virtual Assistant
Position type: Part-time
Work hours: 11:00 AM – 4:00 PM Eastern Time
Work days: Monday - Friday
Salary: $5 - $6 per hour, depending on experience

About Us:

We are committed to helping patients achieve optimal wellness, including specialized treatments such as wave therapy. We are looking for a motivated and skilled Medical Virtual Assistant who can support our practice by enhancing patient communication, managing administrative functions, and contributing to community outreach.

Key Responsibilities:
• Call back old leads and educate them about Medicare-covered services.
• Make outbound cold calls to patients, clinics, and community directors.
• Schedule, confirm, and manage patient appointments.
• Maintain and update patient records using AdvanceMD EMR.
• Process claims, verify insurance, and support billing tasks.
• Coordinate with care providers and discuss sensitive health topics professionally.
• Manage email, text communication, newsletters, and social media accounts.
• Organize reports, spreadsheets, and track tasks using Google Sheets.

Basic Qualifications:
• Experience in the medical field or healthcare setting
• Strong communication skills with minimal accent
• Comfortable handling objections and explaining medical services clearly
• Familiarity with AdvanceMD and Google Suite tools
• Confident, energetic, and passionate about patient support
• Sales experience is a plus, especially in B2C or clinical settings
• Fluent English speaker with a professional and patient-friendly tone
• Self-motivated and experienced in handling sensitive topics
• Energetic, passionate, and able to promote wellness-focused services
• Able to work independently and adapt in a remote setting

Technical Requirements:
• Device: Reliable laptop or desktop computer.
• Internet: High-speed connection (minimum 10 Mbps).
• Audio: Noise-canceling headset.
• Video: Webcam for virtual meetings.
• Workspace: Quiet, professional environment.

For interested applicants, please attach the link to your resume and send it to me with the subject line: IRVING
